text:
Doing @_nightsweekends on hard mode by working on two projects:

1. Expanding art I sell at conventions w/ a digital shop. Also learning how to design art print clothing

2. Developing the novel I'm co-writing w/ my partner that challenges the chosen hero narrative

@_buildspace https://t.co/tM45s3jooJ

user_info.name: Ro be upon ye
